our team Watch demo Talk to our team January 17, 2020 Company news By Emily Loosli Wingtra partners with Ha Dong Trading Services Ha Dong Surveying Commercial Services Joint Stock Company (HDS), based in Hanoi, Vietnam, was founded more than ten years ago by a team of scientific and technical experts in hydroelectricity, geology, cadastral services, geodesy mapping and construction.  The company offers consultation and also provides surveying equipment for a range of projects, including surveying and mapping, technical design based on survey maps, geology engineering reports, mineral reserve exploration, water source monitoring and environmental impact assessments. With the motto of self-innovation, HDS is always updating knowledge and providing outstanding customer-centric service, which partners and investors have come to know, depend on and trust. January 17, 2020 Company news Published by Wingtra Wingtra offers the only connected drone survey solution —from flight planning to CAD and GIS-ready output.
